title: Mining term associations from literature to support knowledge discovery in biology
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The methodology developed in this project has been a basis for a number of projects that have used text mining as enabling technology to collect and harness data that is then used for large-scale curation and processing. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Chemicals,Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Societal
findingsText: This project has developed a text mining framework to identify a number of key biological concepts in text and use various classification and prediction algorithms to suggest new potential relationships that might be worth investigating. The methodology developed has been used in real biological/bioinformatics projects to support knowledge management and discovery. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Chemicals,Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Healthcare,Government, Democracy and Justice,Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
